footer.about: Excellence in carpentry for your home. Design, security, and custom-made.

product.defaultDescription: An exceptional door combining maximum security and contemporary design. Custom finishes available upon request.

company.experienceText: OF EXPERTISE IN IMPORTING AND INSTALLING SUPERIOR QUALITY DOORS

productDescriptions.Modello Roma: A timeless handle design, inspired by the grandeur of ancient Rome. Robust finish and ergonomic grip.
productDescriptions.Modello Venezia: Venetian elegance in a handle. Sophisticated curves recalling the canals of the Doge's city.
productDescriptions.Modello Firenze: A tribute to the Renaissance. Artistic handle combining classic aesthetics with modern functionality.
productDescriptions.Modello Verona: Romanticism and solidity. A handle designed to last with a style specifically traversing eras.
productDescriptions.Modello Siena: Inspired by the warm hues of Tuscany. Rustic-chic design for welcoming interiors.
productDescriptions.Modello Pisa: Bold and unique line, bringing a touch of geometric originality to your door.
productDescriptions.Modello Lucca: Refined simplicity. A discreet yet present handle, perfect for minimalist interiors.
productDescriptions.Modello San Gimignano: Structured and imposing design, evoking medieval towers. For a firm and secure grip.
productDescriptions.Modello Positano: The charm of the Amalfi coast. Glossy finish and fluid lines for a Mediterranean touch.
productDescriptions.Modello Amalfi: Luxury and prestige. A handle with meticulous details, ideal for entrance or living room doors.
productDescriptions.Modello Sorrento: Evokes sun and sea. Luminous design that adapts perfectly to bright interiors.
productDescriptions.Modello Capri: Chic and exclusive. A handle distinguished by its natural elegance and noble materials.
productDescriptions.Modello Portofino: Italian glamour at your fingertips. Premium finish to sublimate your doors.
productDescriptions.Modello Bellagio: The pearl of the lake. Subtle reflections, combining tradition and modernity.
productDescriptions.Modello Como: Sleek and sophisticated design, inspired by the tranquility of Lake Como.
productDescriptions.Porte Milano: The pinnacle of modern design. Sharp lines, impeccable finish, the spirit of the fashion capital.
productDescriptions.Porte Torino: Industrial and chic. A robust door with assertive character, ideal for lofts and offices.
productDescriptions.Porte Bologna: Tradition and conviviality. A warm door inviting entry, with reinforced acoustic insulation.
productDescriptions.Porte Genova: Maritime elegance. Fluid lines and increased resistance to humidity.
productDescriptions.Porte Napoli: Vibrant and expressive. A door that doesn't go unnoticed, available in vibrant finishes.
productDescriptions.Porte Palermo: Southern charm. Mediterranean style with subtle ornamental details.
productDescriptions.Porte Bari: Coastal modernity. Fresh and airy design, perfect for bringing in light.
productDescriptions.Porte Catania: Volcanic beauty. Dark and textured finish for a dramatic and elegant look.
productDescriptions.Porte Trieste: Crossroads of cultures. Eclectic design mixing classic and modern influences.
productDescriptions.Porte Padova: Intellectual and structured. Precise geometric lines for an ordered aesthetic.
productDescriptions.Porte Parma: Gastronomic refinement. A door with rich and smooth finishes.
productDescriptions.Porte Modena: Speed and style. Inspired by Italian automotive design, smooth and aerodynamic finish.
productDescriptions.Porte Brescia: Northern solidity. Reinforced door guaranteeing maximum security and insulation.
productDescriptions.Porte Perugia: Heart of Italy. A balanced central design, adapting to all rooms.
productDescriptions.Porte Livorno: Opening to the world. Robust port design with a touch of naval elegance.
productDescriptions.Modello Bari: Coastal modernity. Fresh and airy design, perfect for bringing in light.

productDescriptions.Maniglia Angelo: Angelic and pure design. Satin chrome finish for a soft touch.
productDescriptions.Maniglia Antonio: Classic and timeless. A tribute to Italian tradition, solid and reliable for all doors.
productDescriptions.Maniglia Enzo: Bold and characteristic. Sporty lines inspired by racing cars, brushed metal finish.
productDescriptions.Maniglia Francesco: Simplicity and elegance. Soft curves naturally adapting to the hand.
productDescriptions.Maniglia Giorgio: Sophisticated and fashionable. A handle bringing a touch of haute couture to your interior.
